article_title: Domestic Use of Military Drones Is No Big Deal. Here's How It Works.
article_text:
Don’t have time to read the Washington Post or New York Times? Then get The Morning Bell, an early morning edition of the day’s most important political news, conservative commentary and original reporting from a team committed to following the truth no matter where it leads.

Email address

article_metadata.description: None of the missions were “spying” on anyone. All the missions were in legitimate and legal support of other organization in the U.S. governmental system.
